Class GenericCellStyle

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.meja.model.generic.GenericCellStyle
All Implemented Interfaces:
CellStyle
public class GenericCellStyle extends Object implements CellStyle
Implementation of the CellStyle interface for GenericSheet.
